K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-1: ta th'a ga ta panytsa buddha na ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-3: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-4: ma h'a yo ga'i don du sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-5: ri ni nyams dga' mdangs bzang ba'i; ;yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-6: byin brlabs mtshams bcad brtan byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-8: dri sna lnga yis mandal bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-9: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-10: mandal brgyad pa'i gzhung bzhin bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-11: de yi rtse mo brgyad la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-12: yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:312b-13: de yi dbus su bsam pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-2: ye nas ma bcos rang byung snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-3: dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-4: de yi nang du blugs pa'i sman //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-5: ye nas rang byung bdud rtsi lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-6: sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-7: dag pa'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi'i dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-8: stong las sbyar bas ye nas dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-9: btag dang bcag dang gzhal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-10: nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-12: stong khams khyab par don byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-13: bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-14: dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-15: bka' bzhin bstan pa'i dngos grub blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-16: mu tig dkar po dri med ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-17: sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-18: mgu ya lag pa'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-20: de dbus klu bdag sa bon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-21: dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-22: dgu pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-23: le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-25: aom gyis ye shes 'od phyung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-26: a'a yis mes bsregs thal bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-27: h'um gis bdud rtsi rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-29: rtags dang mtshan ma bdun gyis 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-30: 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-31: lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-32: mang du 'phel na bsgrub rdzas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313a-33: de la ya mtshan bskyed mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-0: mtshan ma'i rtags @313b dag ma byung na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-1: bskang gso'i cho ga rgya skyed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-2: spogs thags bskyar la rtsal shugs dbyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-3: dam tshig chen po bskang ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-4: bsgrub rdzas rnams kyang bstar nas gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-5: de nas mchod cing dngos grub blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-6: slob ma la yang dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-7: bla ma lung ldan des kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-8: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-9: gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-10: dag dang ma dag mi rtog rtog las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-11: snga ma 'das dang da ltar phyis 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-12: dus gsum gcig la sku bstan phyi bshol med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-13: dngos grub sna tshogs rlabs chen 'bar ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-14: su 'dod sbyin gyi da lta 'di la longs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-15: skal par sbrebs dang gti mug mun nag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-16: sprin mthongs nyi shar khud par dro ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-17: bdud rtsi rgyal po dbang chen 'di byin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-18: rig 'dzin rgyal po gtso bo'i go 'phang thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-19: tshe dang skong dang yid du 'ong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-20: bgegs rnams zhi ba la sogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-21: nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-22: yon tan rtsa brgyad 'di yis thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-23: ces bka' stsal nas de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-25: dbang bskur gnang ba gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:313b-26: 'khor rnams kun gyis thob par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-0: yang 'khor nye ba'i sras mchog dam pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas dbang mnos nas yang rigs lnga dang rigs rgya mtsho'i gtso bo la @314a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-2: rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i don ji ltar blta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-3: don gyi 'bras bu gang lags zhes gsol pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-5: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-6: tshangs dang drang srong gtsang ma za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-7: de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-8: klu dang bram ze gtsang ma za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-9: de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-10: byol song rtsva mchog za ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-11: ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-12: de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-13: yang dag don gyi lung 'di nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-14: rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-15: chos sku gcig las tha dad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-16: rigs lnga'i kha dog 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-17: 'di ltar rtog na grol zhes bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-18: rang bzhin ye nas dag pa'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-19: mnyam pa'i dbyings su rab rtogs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-20: gnyis med don gyis zin pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-21: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-22: dngos dang dngos med rtog pa'i mchen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-23: gtsang dang mi gtsang rtog pa'i mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-24: mkhas pas dbus la gnas mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-25: ye shes sku lnga bstan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-26: byang chub sems ni dkar bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-27: dri med dkar bas ye shes sku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-28: rakta chags med dmar bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-29: chags med rnam dag chos kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-30: mam sa yid bzhin rin chen sngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-31: sna tshogs 'byung gnas mnyam nyid sku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-32: rin chen gser mdog snang mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-33: mngon 'byung sprul pa chos kyi sku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314a-34: dri chu dag byed ljang khu'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-0: @314b kun tu don grub las rab sku'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-1: sku lnga lhun grub bdud rtsi 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-2: so so'i lus la gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-3: dri chen dri chu rakta dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-4: mam sa sems chu 'di rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-5: sems can rtog pa zlog pa'i phyir; ;gtso ru dang du blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-6: gtsang sme med par kun gyis spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-7: 'di dag grol bar ngas bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-8: the tshom med pas dngos grub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-9: spyod pa'i skyes bu rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-12: 'di yan chad ma h'a yo ga'i don gyi lung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-010:314b-13: sgrub thabs bdud rtsi chen po 'bum sde las btus pa'i bam po chen po lnga pa'o ////
